title: Thai red curry with roasted duck
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '125ml chicken stock', '2 kaffir lime leaves, torn', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '15g Thai basil leaves', '1 whole roasted duck, cut into pieces', '1 (565g) tin lychees, drained (optional)', '1 (225g) tin bamboo shoots, drained', '3 red chillies, thinly sliced']
